description.raw: There were a few issues with the topo_tsv.py script being in a separate file, since it was not using consistent names for the tile names. This is an attempt to add the functionality of the topo_tsv.py script into tile_tsv.py, so that the same model names are used for the tiles when generating the .world and .dot files. I've tested it a bit with the tunnel_qual.tsv, and currently the vertices section is largely unchanged, though I changed the vertex symbol for the base station to 'S' instead of a number. The edge outputs are very different, since they are sorted, so that's a bit tougher to evaluate.
